caller_intent: Margaret wants to switch her National General insurance policy billing method to monthly direct bill (instead of auto pay) and make an immediate payment for the upcoming billing cycle.
resolution_steps: Agent Heather confirms the policy details and billing change request.
Explains the new billing schedule (due on the 23rd of each month) and processes immediate payment.
Accepts credit card payment over the phone (card number, expiration, and CVV provided).
Provides confirmation number and sends email receipt.
Informs client of future payment amounts and schedules.
knowledge_required: Billing options (direct bill vs. auto pay)
summary: Heather assists Margaret in switching her National General insurance billing to monthly direct payments, processes an immediate credit card payment, and confirms the change with a confirmation number and email receipt. The client is informed of future payment amounts and schedules.
